message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its high value and unique features, it's worth more than $10000 to us. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your operations, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $12000. This represents a significant saving compared to our standard pricing, while still allowing us to cover our costs and ensure a fair return. I trust that you will find the product invaluable for your needs. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. Looking forward to your positive response.
